sect2.title: Introduction
sect2.para: You can write functions for the logic tier of Wolframe in languages based on .NET (http://www.microsoft.com/net) like for example C# and VB.NET. Because .NET based libraries can only be called by Wolframe only as a compiled and not as an interpreted language, you have to build a module out of your function implementation.
The implementation of .NET calls is not yet available. The implementation exists as prove of concept in a test program. But Wolframe will provide .NET functions soon.
